attributes.action: make an urgent public statement confirming that it is actually Lord Mandelson who is running the country and not him.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people are confused.  McBroon has said nothing since he was rescued by the Dark Prince at the PLP meeting yet he (the Dark Prince) has made many statements about HIS policies for the country.  McBroon needs to lay out what the position is with regard to who is running the country.  The people have RIGHT to know.
